abstract: Economists note that some of the work that solar power industry creates goes to people who already have jobs; about 24,000 work in solar manufacturing in United States, compared with 52,500 in installation, out of total of about 100,000, up 6.8 percent in last year.
snippet: Economists note that some of the work that renewable energy creates goes to people who already have jobs, like roofers and truck drivers.
lead_paragraph: Economists note that some of the work that renewable energy creates goes to people who already have jobs, like roofers and truck drivers.

headline.main: Solar Power Industry Falls Short of Hopes in Job Creation
headline.print_headline: Solar Power Industry Falls Short of Hopes in Job Creation
headline.seo: In Terms of Jobs, Solar Energy Lacks Power
